name: BoostFactor
description:
Made for the GMTKJam 2018.

A racing game where you have no direct control over your movement upwards, you must rely on hitting the pads on the ground to speed you up or slow you down to navigate the course in the fastest time possible.

When you are thrown into darkness and the timer stops, you have finished the course. Please quit the game and start again to get the best time!

-------

Controls:

move left: a

move right: d

pause: esc

----

Concept : Sandep Hoonjan and Tom Green

Design: Sandeep Hoonjan

Programming: Sandeep Hoonjan

Tools: Unity, Adobe Photoshop 2015
